name: Xplicity
tagline: We know how to get you there faster.
description:
Xplicity is a Lithuanian–Dutch custom software development company, that for the past 15+ years has helped numerous partners in different countries bringing their visions to life.
We provide software development remotely worldwide. Xplicity uses the latest technologies to create desktop, web and mobile apps, cross platform applications that adapt, scale, and perform flawlessly. Agile and Scrum methodologies, actively practiced by our developers allows us to deliver the result rapidly and of high quality
We are known and valued for our close-knit relationships with our clients, exceptional communication, and the delivery of the best possible result. The best possible result is our priority.
